rows.label: tlk41200122_02_msg0001
rows.name:
There, there, Armu...
It's all okay now.

rows.label: tlk41200122_02_msg0002
rows.name:
...What do you mean, "what's wrong"?!
Because the water tower fell, all the
Armu got scared and are terrified!

rows.label: tlk41200122_02_msg0003
rows.name:
The ranch is all muddy
and messy now, too.

rows.label: tlk41200122_02_msg0004
rows.name:
This is all Iira's fault! If
you're going to come rescue
your friends, do it peacefully!

rows.label: tlk41200122_02_msg0005
rows.name:
There, there, there, there!
It's all okay now, Armu...
